comment.author: 20949561@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called NSW-WEST, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 61804295@N00
comment._content:
To Museums and Collections,  I think a lot of invites to Commons contributors are best made by adding a link on a few of your relevant shots, or on your Pools general description.
Many institutions may not have the time to monitor and join other groups just to add them for the joy of that Pools' admin...
